lines.text: Just hang on, folks. I repeat, just hang on.

[to his partner]
Hey. I better go check on our equipment.

[to his partner/sarcasm]
You better suit-up, Buddy. I'll go check on the gear.
Veeeery cute. Alright, kid... come on out right now!
Hey, what the hell are we moppin' up here anyway?

[amazed]
Damn! That was fast! What'chew do, man? Cut yourself or somthin'?

[angry/shouting]
I'm gonna kick your ass! You son of a bitch!

[calling/shouting]
Help! I need some help up here! Help!

[at the sametime]
What the hell?
Shit!

[to his partner, uneasy/funny]
BC9-72?
Looks like something out of a goddamn Area-51 to me.
No. This is that Chemical Warefare stuff we ain't suppose to be making anymore.
Base. This is Andromeda-601, do you copy? Over.
Base. This is Andromeda-601. Do you copy? Over.
Yeah, we're about 30 miles east of ground zero.

[to his partner]
You better suit up.
Remind me, what am I doing here?
I know this isn't the French Riviera, honey.
How would I know, no-one ever takes me there.
You the Yeagers?
Used to be, you're meeting the budget version.
Get back inside!
No way.

[he points the gun at him]
Now!
You're bluffin', and I know it.
Dad, it's too quiet here.
I got a little present for ya!
My truck, that is my truck you bastard!
There was no-one driving, no-one.
There had to be someone driving with their head down, trucks don't drive by themselves!
They're talking to each other!

[throwing arms over face/screaming]
AHHHHHHH!
